freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate:
reference REF_B_NL43 <#list rows as row> <#assign gene>${row["Gene"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign substitutions>${row["Substitutions"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign firstCodonMatch = substitutions?matches("(\\d+)[A-Z].*")> <#assign firstCodon = firstCodonMatch?groups[1]> <#assign variationName>CapsidMut_${gene}_${substitutions}</#assign>
feature-location ${gene} create variation ${variationName} -t AMINO_ACID "Lethal mutations" variation ${variationName} set field displayName "${gene}:${substitutions}" set field variation_category "${variationName}" set field aa_position "${firstCodon}" set field aa_substitutions "${substitutions}" exit exit </#list> exit
